text: was a Japanese actor. His career began in 1995. He was born in Tokyo. His best known roles were as Kunzite in Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon (2003), Kanai in Kamen Rider Blade (2004) and as Aberu in Kamen Rider Kiva. Kubodera killed himself at his apartment in Tokyo on November 13, 2020 at the age of 43. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Suicides Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Akira Kubodera
